card.name: Abandoned Outpost

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No one can fight the tide forever."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As fleeting as a cephalid's promise.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who will not follow are doomed to lead.

card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Ancestor protects us in ways we can't begin to comprehend."—Mystic elder

card.name: Animal Boneyard
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The animal spirits are the Ancestor's grandchildren. Remember them."—Mystic elder

card.name: Ashen Firebeast

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm not sure which impresses me most, its thoroughness or its intensity."—Matoc, lavamancer

property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beauty stirs the memory like a sweet perfume excites the air.

card.name: Aven Archer
card.property: Flying {2}{W}, {T}: Aven Archer deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Aimed by the eyes of eagles, their arrows never miss the mark.

card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Aven Cloudchaser enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At the Reapportionment, Eagle begged to be human. The Ancestor granted half that prayer."—Nomad myth

card.name: Aven Fisher
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Aven Fisher dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The same spears that catch their food today will defend their homes tomorrow.

card.name: Aven Flock
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {W}: Aven Flock gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as each added feather steadies the wing, so does the flock grow stronger with each new member.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a world still pained from burns, some are born already scarred.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The tiniest ripple tells a story ten fathoms deep."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It helps to have an extra direction in which to run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I once saw a single barbarian charge a band of twenty nomads. I've seen some crazy ones, too."—Nomad sentry

property.name: Flavor

property.value: The pits swallow the weak as predators swallow prey.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature is the endless dance between life and death."—Seton, centaur druid

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barbarians equate courage with the ability to endure pain.

card.name: Blessed Orator
card.property: Other creatures you control get +0/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His quiet words fade into the night's chill, yet they burn into his listeners' minds with all the power of a thousand suns.

card.name: Bog Wreckage

Whenever a creature has four or more fuse counters on it, remove all fuse counters from it and destroy it. That creature deals 4 damage to its controller.

card.name: Braids, Cabal Minion
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices an artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Home is where you can find a decent graveyard and strangers can disappear without awkward questions."

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pain teaches lessons no scholar can."—Kamahl, pit fighter

card.name: Cabal Inquisitor
card.property: Threshold — {1}{B}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery and only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Cabal Patriarch

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Books are like crops—they must be thinned for best yield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Finding the way once is luck. Finding the way twice takes a good map."

property.name: Flavor

card.property: Target player can't cast creature spells this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the crimson fades from the magical embers, a final wisp of smoke will rise. Soon after, hostilities will begin anew.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Amazing, isn't it, what humans will throw away when they're drowning?"

property.value: Cephalids whisper flattery in your ear, put jewels in your hand, spin dreams in your head, and stick knives in your back.

property.value: The more they survey the dreadful dry expanses, the more the cephalids thirst to tame them.

If you do, return that card to your hand."

property.value: "If he's so willing to suffer for his cause, then by all means, let us oblige him."—Cabal Patriarch

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the sea came all life, and to the sea it will return. The sooner the better."—Emperor Aboshan

card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Flashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.value: "Pound the steel until it fits.Doesn't work? Bash to bits."—Dwarven forging song

card.name: Dogged Hunter

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The world has enough strife as it is. Where would we be if we turned against each other?"—Pianna, nomad captain

card.property: Destroy target land. Flashback {5}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.value: "Two or three tons of rock can really get you down—and keep you there."—Kamahl, pit fighter

card.name: Sarcatog
card.property: Exile two cards from your graveyard: Sarcatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Sacrifice an artifact: Sarcatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Savage Firecat
card.property: Trample Savage Firecat enters the battlefield with seven +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever you tap a land for mana, remove a +1/+1 counter from Savage Firecat.

card.name: Scorching Missile
card.property: Scorching Missile deals 4 damage to target player. Flashback {9}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Screams of the Damned
card.property: {1} {B}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Screams of the Damned deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's important to face your inner demons . . . unless they're the kind of demons that can kill you.

card.name: Scrivener
card.property: When Scrivener enters the battlefield, you may return target instant card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A good memory is no match for a good scribe.

card.name: Seafloor Debris
card.property: Seafloor Debris enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Seafloor Debris: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Second Thoughts
card.property: Exile target attacking creature. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It suddenly dawned on Jorin that farming was quite a noble profession.

card.name: Seize the Day
card.property: Untap target creature. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Seton's Desire
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, all creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

card.name: Seton, Krosan Protector
card.property: Tap an untapped Druid you control: Add {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Survival of the fittest is not only the law of the pits, it is the law of nature. That is why I fight."

card.name: Shadowblood Egg
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Shadowblood Egg: Add {B}{R} to your mana pool. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Does your passion for power consume your soul?"—Watnik, master glassblower

card.name: Shadowblood Ridge
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add {B}{R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The carnage of conflicts long past still stains the Otarian soil.

card.name: Shadowmage Infiltrator
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever Shadowmage Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

card.name: Shelter
card.property: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Good strategists seize opportunities. Great strategists make their own.

card.name: Shifty Doppelganger
card.property: {3} {U}, Exile Shifty Doppelganger: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, that creature gains haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice that creature. If you do, return Shifty Doppelganger to the battlefield.

card.name: Shower of Coals
card.property: Shower of Coals deals 2 damage to each of up to three target creatures and/or players. Threshold — Shower of Coals deals 4 damage to each of those creatures and/or players instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Simplify
card.property: Each player sacrifices an enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A blossom's petals close inward to shut out the frost.—Nantuko teaching

card.name: Skeletal Scrying
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Skeletal Scrying, exile X cards from your graveyard. You draw X cards and you lose X life.

card.name: Skull Fracture
card.property: Target player discards a card. Flashback {3}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Skycloud Egg
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Skycloud Egg: Add {W}{U} to your mana pool. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have your dreams of a better society become an obsession?"—Watnik, master glassblower

card.name: Skycloud Expanse
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add {W}{U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From Otaria, the sun above meets the sea below at a glittering horizon.

card.name: Skyshooter
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) {T}, Sacrifice Skyshooter: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with flying.

card.name: Soulcatcher
card.property: Flying Whenever a creature with flying dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Soulcatcher.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Holy couriers guide aven spirits up to the home of the Ancestor."—Mystic elder

card.name: Spark Mage
card.property: Whenever Spark Mage deals combat damage to a player, you may have Spark Mage deal 1 damage to target creature that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Pardic Mountains are known for their spicy cuisine.

card.name: Spellbane Centaur
card.property: Creatures you control can't be the targets of blue spells or abilities from blue sources.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No mage's deception can harm those who keep nature balanced."

card.property: If a black source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.

card.property: If a red source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.

card.name: Sphere of Reason
card.property: If a blue source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.

card.name: Sphere of Truth
card.property: If a white source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.

card.name: Spiritualize
card.property: Until end of turn, whenever target creature deals damage, you gain that much life. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is purity in all things. Even hatred."—Lieutenant Kirtar

card.name: Springing Tiger
card.property: Threshold — Springing Tiger gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ground trembled in a violent purr.

card.name: Squirrel Mob
card.property: Squirrel Mob gets +1/+1 for each other Squirrel on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An army of squirrels is still an army.

card.name: Squirrel Nest
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Krosan Forest, you've got to keep an eye out for the squirrels.

card.name: Stalking Bloodsucker
card.property: Flying {1}{B}, Discard a card: Stalking Bloodsucker gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pits feed both its thirst for combat and its thirst for blood.

card.name: Standstill
card.property: When a player casts a spell, sacrifice Standstill. If you do, each of that player's opponents draws three cards.

card.name: Steam Vines

card.property: {3}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. {1}, Sacrifice Steamclaw: Exile target card from a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's dead, and then there's dead dead."—Steamclaw driver

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The centaurs' simple magic can undo a basilisk's gaze, but only for a short time.

card.name: Stone-Tongue Basilisk
card.property: Whenever Stone-Tongue Basilisk deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat. Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, all creatures able to block Stone-Tongue Basilisk do so.

card.name: Sungrass Egg
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Sungrass Egg: Add {G}{W} to your mana pool. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Has your peaceful nature led you on a crusade?"—Watnik, master glassblower

card.name: Sungrass Prairie
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add {G}{W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Otaria, peace and harmony are rare. Places that provide both are cherished.

card.name: Syncopate
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Memories can't simply be washed away. The mind must be scrubbed clean."—Ambassador Laquatus

card.name: Tainted Pact
card.property: Exile the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand unless it has the same name as another card exiled this way. Repeat this process until you put a card into your hand or you exile two cards with the same name, whichever comes first.

card.name: Tarnished Citadel
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Tarnished Citadel deals 3 damage to you.

card.name: Tattoo Ward
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has protection from enchantments. This effect doesn't remove Tattoo Ward. Sacrifice Tattoo Ward: Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Terravore
card.property: Trample Terravore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of land cards in all graveyards.

card.name: Testament of Faith
card.property: {X}: Testament of Faith becomes an X/X Wall creature with defender in addition to its other types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Belief in the Ancestor is admirable, but our enemies often demand something more . . . tangible."—Pianna, nomad captain

card.name: Thaumatog
card.property: Sacrifice a land: Thaumatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Sacrifice an enchantment: Thaumatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Thermal Blast
card.property: Thermal Blast deals 3 damage to target creature. Threshold — Thermal Blast deals 5 damage to that creature instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cephalids seek knowledge not to better themselves, but to best others.

card.name: Thought Devourer
card.property: Flying Your maximum hand size is reduced by four.

card.name: Thought Eater
card.property: Flying Your maximum hand size is reduced by three.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first memory it sucks out of its host is how to get rid of it.

card.name: Thought Nibbler
card.property: Flying Your maximum hand size is reduced by two.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Balshan wizards have long used them to gnaw away the memories they wish to forget.

card.name: Timberland Ruins
card.property: Timberland Ruins enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Timberland Ruins: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Time Stretch
card.property: Target player takes two extra turns after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's lots of time like the present.

card.name: Tireless Tribe
card.property: Discard a card: Tireless Tribe gets +0/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've survived starvation, dwarf attacks, and heatstroke. Why should a little sandstorm bother us?"

card.name: Tombfire
card.property: Target player exiles all cards with flashback from his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fondest memories burn brightest. As they're lost forever, the flames grow hotter still.

card.name: Touch of Invisibility
card.property: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cephalids specialize in things unseen, be they politics, betrayal, or themselves.

card.name: Traumatize
card.property: Target player puts the top half of his or her library, rounded down, into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dreads had half a mind to leave.

card.name: Traveling Plague
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of each upkeep, put a plague counter on Traveling Plague. Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each plague counter on Traveling Plague. When enchanted creature leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller returns Traveling Plague from its owner's graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Treetop Sentinel
card.property: Flying, protection from green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crian's patrols afford him plenty of opportunity to take potshots at the "dirtwalkers" far below.

card.name: Tremble
card.property: Each player sacrifices a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Otaria's frequent tremors are the last stages of Dominaria's recovery from the Phyrexian war.

card.name: Twigwalker
card.property: {1} {G}, Sacrifice Twigwalker: Two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Break one in half and you'll get a decent—if gooey—pair of weapons."—Centaur warrior

card.name: Unifying Theory
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player may pay {2}. If the player does, he or she draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scribbles of a lunatic and formulas of a genius are often indistinguishable.

card.name: Upheaval
card.property: Return all permanents to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The calm comes after the storm.

card.name: Vampiric Dragon
card.property: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Vampiric Dragon this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampiric Dragon. {1}{R}: Vampiric Dragon deals 1 damage to target creature.

card.name: Verdant Succession
card.property: Whenever a green nontoken creature dies, that creature's controller may search his or her library for a card with the same name as that creature and put it onto the battlefield. If that player does, he or she shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Vivify
card.property: Target land becomes a 3/3 creature until end of turn. It's still a land. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Near the Krosan border, farmers keep watch over their fields lest the sod get up and wander away.

card.name: Volcanic Spray
card.property: Volcanic Spray deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. Flashback {1}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Volley of Boulders
card.property: Volley of Boulders deals 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. Flashback {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Wayward Angel
card.property: Flying, vigilance Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Wayward Angel gets +3/+3, is black, has trample, and has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature."

card.name: Werebear
card.property: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Threshold — Werebear gets +3/+3 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He exercises his right to bear arms.

card.name: Whipkeeper
card.property: {T}: Whipkeeper deals damage to target creature equal to the damage already dealt to it this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you don't hit your adversaries while they're down, they might get up again."

card.name: Whispering Shade
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) {B}: Whispering Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It glides through the shadows until it reaches yours.

card.name: Wild Mongrel
card.property: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It teaches you to play dead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What is a tree?Slow hard thought.What is a flower?Swift soft flesh.What is a druid?Both.

card.name: Words of Wisdom
card.property: You draw two cards, then each other player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Knowledge can't be kept in a bottle or sealed in a box. It yearns to be spread and shared.

card.name: Zombie Assassin
card.property: {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard and Zombie Assassin: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Zombies don't kill. They recruit."—Braids, dementia summoner

card.name: Zombie Cannibal
card.property: Whenever Zombie Cannibal deals combat damage to a player, you may exile target card from that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing is sacred to the undead—not even their own kind.

card.name: Zombie Infestation
card.property: Discard two cards: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The nomads' funeral pyres are more practical than ceremonial.

card.name: Zombify
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first birth celebrates life. The second birth mocks it."—Mystic elder

card.name: Zoologist
card.property: {3} {G}, {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With friends like these, who needs people?"
